 General inquiries 
    Have a question about investing, working with advisors or fraud? Our staff experts can provide information to help you invest wisely and confidently. 
    We also help market participants meet their regulatory requirements by providing guidance on topics like registration, regulatory filings, SEDI and fees.
 We Can Help 
 Phone: 1-877-785-1555 
 Email:  inquiries@osc.gov.on.ca 
 Fax: 416-593-8122 
 Online form 
 Check Before You Invest  - Tools and resources to help you protect against investment fraud. 
 Close x 
 Complaints or concerns 
    Have a complaint about a company, an investment product, or the conduct of your 
    financial advisor? Been a victim of investor fraud or a scam?
 We Can Help 
 Phone: 1-877-785-1555 
 Email:  inquiries@osc.gov.on.ca 
 Fax: 416-593-8122
